column5: Been a while since I posted anything but now I can can post pics right from my phone. Things will be easier and quicker for me.  Sorry I'm lazy.  Early spring was good lots of fish shallow and mixed. Here is a few shots.
Like that last pic, could see a little cabin on the far shore to spend the whole summer.
Is that first pic one of those monster black bass I'm always reading about.......
LOL! looks like a couple of dinks in that school too? Great pics though!
